relevance_explanation: The routine was correctly trimmed to only include steps relevant to the customer, based on their account type (ROTH_IRA and client level PREMIUM). The branch involving apply_address_hold was correctly pruned since this only applies to STANDARD client level. The customer data was used to successfully inline the get_account_type_extra tool call.
completeness_explanation: All necessary steps and logic were preserved for this customer. The trimmed routine includes collecting the new address, validating it, updating the address, completing the case, and handling errors.
